testcase.name: Verify the pagination is present
testcase.system-out: Given user loads the data from "excel" located at "src\test\resources\Fixture\Promo_DB_Data.xlsx".passed Then user launches browser with url "#TestUrl"..............................passed And user enters the Promo code "#Promo Code" in Search box named " Promo / PST / TA Code ".passed And user clicks on the search button........................................passed When user checks that maximum 10 promo box are present in search result.....passed Then user can see page number and pagination icon...........................passed

testcase.name: Verify the pagination is absent
testcase.system-out: Given user loads the data from "excel" located at "src\test\resources\Fixture\Promo_DB_Data.xlsx".passed Then user launches browser with url "#TestUrl"..............................passed And user enters the Promo code "#Promo Code" in Search box named " Promo / PST / TA Code ".passed And user clicks on the search button........................................passed When promo box is less than 9 then user can't see page number and pagination icon.passed
